Title: Sleepy Bee Menu
Description: Restaurant owners wanted an interactive way to engage with their menu especially during Covid-19, where physical menus are out of the question.  They can update the menu anytime through a live back end.

Title: Cleanlites Order Form
Description: This is a very complex order form that does not transfer easily to a computer setting.  In line with helping the company integrate with their CRM software, we worked to make this order form accessible and extensible.

Title: Covid-19 Data Viz
Description: Since the outbreak of Covid-19 NY magazine has been tracking sentiment. Using a combination of node.js, a little Python and mostly vanilla javascript, we vizualized the data in compelling ways.

Title: Flashcard Study App
Description: This was a capstone project for my tech bootcamp.  We made an interactive game that builds and stores study decks and cards.

Title: Custom Pre Loader
Description: Using adobe after effects and my own branding I made a custom .gif preloader for my website.

Title: Lighting Style Quiz
Description: This quiz was made for an application I am working on that brings lighting designers to your house without needing in-person consultations.

Title: JS Drum Machine
Description: I am trying to learn everything there is to know about the Javascript engine.  Part of this was having some fun with the audio buffer.
